summary:
So I found a small island "beyond solitude" and thought: "Man,I really want to make a player home mod!" So,here it is!
With this little mod,you get:
-A new mansion on your very own island with everything you´ll ever need
-More storage space than you´ll ever need
-Every single shrine,in case you´re
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~*gasp* What is this?~~~~~~~~~~~~
If you couldn´t tell by now,it´s a home,for you,the player,on an island.


~~~~~~How about being a bit more precise?~~~~~~~
No...
Jk,here´s what this mod includes:
-A new home for you on a lovely island,which totally hasn´t got the skeleton of someone,who appearantly died here,
on it
-A docked ship loaded with sweetrolls
-And a little farm that you´re totally gonna use

~~~~~~~~~~Just tell me what´s inside!~~~~~~~~~~~~
Okay,okay,fine...
-Up front,quite a bit of weapon racks and mannequins and even some customly mounted weapon plaques

-To the left,an enchanting and alchemy area,complete with Potion Shelf,lots of chests to store and organize your ingredients,a little garden with almost every ingredient you´re (n)ever gonna need,leek,an enchanting table with a convenient storage for soul gems,so you have them at hand when needed,and a pretty display case,which I personally like to use to store all my daedra hearts in

-To the right,upstairs,you´ll find a comfortable open bedroom with a large double bed,two nightstands on either side of it,a bookshelf(they´re a pain to make),and some shelfs on the wall to throw some ♥♥♥♥(or treasures,I don´t care) on
It even has some fancy magic ceiling lamps
-To the right,but downstairs,there´s a little kitchen,with central cooking spit,a cozy fireplace,some hanging dead animals(no fox),and A FRIDGE! (didn´t expect a fridge in Skyrim,huh?)

-If you go back to the enchanting table and take a look next to it,there´s actually a trapdoor that leads to the basement of this.Now the basement is where it´s getting real.
-Left and right are everything you need for crafting,like: a smelter,a forge,a workbench,a sharpening wheel and a tanning rack,if you´re into that,along with a few chests to store your smithing stuff
-Going straight,you´ll walk through a small corridor that has all the shrines,in case you´re picky
-The big room that this corridor ends in probably has more storage and hoarding space than you´re ever gonna need.It´s meant to be played with other mods that add weapons and/or armor to the game,how else would you ever be able to fill all of these chests and mannequins

Pro Tip:Don´t search the horker

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Wait,where is it actually?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Look at your map,it´s on an island beyond Solitude (what a play on words).
Don´t worry,it´s got a map marker

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Are you a banana?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Silence,my brother.
author: McBook
